attributes.action: The UK to Boycott, Divest and Sanction Israel Now!
attributes.additional_details: Under the Genocide Convention, the UK, as a UN member state, has a legal obligation to intervene to prevent further killings, destruction and the annihilation of the Palestinian people.  Israel will not stop until military, diplomatic, political and economic sanctions are enforced now!   To avoid complicity, the UK Government must change its course and be on the right side of History.   Like it was done with apartheid South Africa, cut all ties with this rogue, plausible genocidal state of Israel NOW!
attributes.background: The International Court of Justice has issued arrest warrants and declared Israel to be an illegally occupying apartheid state.  The UK can no longer support an ethnonational, apartheid state that has illegally occupied, oppressed and subjugated the Palestinians.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701379
